author: Alex Puncekar
description:
Gyfted is the first part in an epic fantasy trilogy from D.W. Lewis. Kal is a mistreated hollowborn, someone without the magical abilities of the gyft, powers that most of the population has. When Kal’s friend Ovet is kidnapped by the Daevan Empire for her strange powers, Kal goes on a path of revenge that […]

The post REVIEW: Gyfted by D.W. Lewis appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Gyfted by D.W. Lewis

author: Elizabeth Tabler
description:
Powerhouse speculative fiction voices, Mary Robinette Kowal and Sam J. Miller, have teamed up as part of Simon & Schuster’s Saga Doubles. In it, two authors write stories; in this case, Kowal and Miller have written two expertly crafted science fiction crime stories set in the far future. Kowal’s story, Apprehension, is about a grieving […]

title: INTERVIEW: with authors Mary Robinette Kowal and Sam J. Miller
